description: FortiMail is a cloud-based email filtering solution designed to provide advanced security for email communications. It protects organizations by identifying and blocking spam, phishing attempts, and other malicious content before it reaches user inboxes. FortiMail employs various filtering techniques, including reputation-based filtering, content inspection, and attachment scanning. Additionally, it offers customizable policies to help organizations comply with industry regulations. This versatile tool is instrumental for securing email environments and is often integrated with other security solutions for enhanced threat management.
